meanings.definition: A drug used to treat anxiety and itching.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed hydroxyzine to help me relax and stop scratching my skin.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended hydroxyzine for my anxiety and itchy rash.
meanings.sent3: After taking hydroxyzine, I felt so calm that I forgot what was making me anxious in the first place!
meanings.sent4: The hydroxyzine was like a magic potion, soothing both my mind and my skin.
meanings.sent5: The effects of hydroxyzine were like a gentle breeze, easing my worries and discomfort.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication sold under brand names such as Vistaril and Atarax.
meanings.sent1: I asked my doctor if I could switch to hydroxyzine instead of the brand name medication.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained that hydroxyzine is the same as Vistaril and Atarax, just a different name.
meanings.sent3: When I saw the price difference, I realized that hydroxyzine was the budget-friendly option!
meanings.sent4: Choosing hydroxyzine over the brand names felt like a smart decision, saving me money without sacrificing quality.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of hydroxyzine's name made it easy to remember and compare to other medications.
